title: Collaborative Problem-Solving-Based Science Education Technology Environment Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary science education theories and general teaching skills
context.additional_context: Collaborative environment for in-service elementary teachers to design and implement science teaching techniques applicable to actual classroom settings

learning_goals: Learners can apply collaborative problem-solving strategies to address real-world elementary science classroom issues.
Learners can evaluate and improve the science education technology design process by utilizing metacognition (self-reflection).
Learners can maintain motivation in open learning environments and complete educational technology projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
